recyclable_percentage_description: Ege Carpets have launched a take-back system in a step towards solving the carpet waste issue. The system ensures used carpets go to our recycling partners who separate and recycle up to 98-100% of the carpet components.
recycling_process_description: We invest in the development of new products and techniques which ensures that the carpets are easier to separate and can be reused, recycled or composted.
